text: Gennaro Contaldo in the house! Gennaro! Gennaro Contal... he's eating.

If that chicken was a woman would you marry it?
Mm-hmm. Yeah. Today I'm gonna make cannelloni!
Ravioli. Chickens skewers. Hallelujah! I love it!
We love just being next to each other, cooking. Let's make a focaccia! Focaccia? Yes!
Stretch and breathe! Stretch and breathe in, ahh!
He's got the biggest amount of subscribers for an old age pensioner on the planet for cooking. Look at that!
I'm looking forward to getting old with you. I'll make you nice little soups because you've got no teeth.
Shittiest wood fired oven in the world I've seen.
Ow! Don't talk, just eat it.
Why am I cooking so good! Yes! Why am I cooking so goood?
Why am I cooking soo gooood?
Why am I cooking so good? Yeah!
